content: सवर्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [समानो वर्णो यस्य] {@--1@} Of the same colour. {@--2@} Of like appearance, like, resembling; दुर्वर्णभित्तिरिह सांद्रसुधासवर्णा <ls>Śi. 4. 28</ls>; <ls>Me. 18</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Of the same caste or tribe. {@--4@} Of the same kind, similar. {@--5@} Belonging to the same class of letters, requiring the same effort (of the organs of speech) in pronunciation; तुल्यास्यप्रयत्नं सवर्णं <ls>P. I. 1. 9</ls>.
